properties.name: content
properties.description: • content - (Optional) The content of file to create. Conflicts with sensitive_content and content_base64.

properties.name: sensitive_content
properties.description: • sensitive_content - (Optional) The content of file to create. Will not be displayed in diffs. Conflicts with content and content_base64.

properties.name: content_base64
properties.description: • content_base64 - (Optional) The base64 encoded content of the file to create. Use this when dealing with binary data. Conflicts with content and sensitive_content.

properties.name: filename
properties.description: • filename - (Required) The path of the file to create.

properties.name: file_permission
properties.description: • file_permission - (Optional) The permission to set for the created file. Expects an a string. The default value is "0777".

properties.name: directory_permission
properties.description: • directory_permission - (Optional) The permission to set for any directories created. Expects a string. The default value is "0777".
Any required parent directories will be created automatically, and any existing file with the given name will be overwritten.
